inclusion.criterion: Preterm infant of less than 32 gestational weeks and weighting less than 1500g.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Preterm infant with severe congenital malformation
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
